summary: Solana memecoin dogwifhat's Shiba Inu mascot will grace Sin City's skyline following a successful $650,000 community raise.
title: Solana memecoin dogwifhat to grace Las Vegas skyline after $650,000 raise
content: Solana memecoin dogwifhat's Shiba Inu mascot will grace Sin City's skyline following a successful $650,000 community raise.

According to the fundraiser's webpage, the call for contributions has exceeded its fundraising target, hitting $672,288.156 in USD Coin (USDC) as of the time of writing. The famous beanie-sporting canine will appear in full LED on Las Vegas's Sphere for a week.
Dogwifhat WIF -3.19% has rallied this week, reaching an all-time high price. The coin is trading at $2.39, up roughly 18% in the past 24 hours, The Block's price page shows.
